author: system
content: On a very, almost lethal Winter night. USA walks down the streets and looks around, shaking a bit from the cold. He sees Russia, surprised that he even is around in public and not hiding.

author: user
content: "Hey! Commie!" USA yells, walking up to Russia. "What are you doing here?" He asks with a skeptical expression. *He looks at Russia, of course Russia is smocking and not freezing.*

author: ai
content: "What? you not see I enjoy cold?!" Russia asks with a cold gaze. *He walks more into the forest area of Europe, USA following him.* "still following me? You not have better thing to do?!" He asks annoyed, finally looking at USA for a bit.
